评论概述: SHRINKS - Buy at Least One Size Up
评论详情: I'm an XL and bought this shirt in XL.  Liked it when it arrived.  Material felt good.  Looked roomy, so put it on over a concert t-shirt I was already wearing, and it fit comfortably - plenty of room to move, even with a shirt on under it.  So washed it in cold water.  Came out of the wash (no dryer) with significant shrinkage.  The shirt is now uncomfortably tight and short.  I could get by wearing it like this, but body-hugging is not the look or feel I was going for with this style of shirt.

Look this shirt looks fine and worked great for one day of wearing. Maybe I shouldn't have washed it in the washing machine but who has time to look at labels. After a wash the colors bleed and it just doesn't look nice anymore. If you need a quick costume or one time wear then sure this might be your shirt otherwise, you might spend a little more on something else.  2 Stars because I could only wear it once--but it looked nice then.  Non-AI Summary: Colors bleed after washing, a good "costume" shirt or one-time wear.

评论概述: Nice quality at first; runs small & will shrink
评论详情: Better, sturdier quality fabric than anticipated.  Followed recommendation from other reviews to order a size larger and it was a good idea.  My husband normally wears an XL, so went with an XXL and it fit great.  HOWEVER, it is 95% cotton and 5% linen.  The Dry Clean Only instruction was covered by the replacement button.  Even though I washed it in cool water, it shrunk considerably - from an XXL to what appears to be a M.  What used to fit loosely across my husband's chest now has an 6-inch gap and is tight around the arms.  We're hoping our grandson can wear it.  So sad.
